meanings.definition: Outside the regular curriculum or program of activities
meanings.sent1: The school offers many extracurricular clubs for students to join.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys participating in extracurricular sports like soccer and basketball.
meanings.sent3: The extracurricular art class turned out to be a fun way to spend her afternoons.
meanings.sent4: His love for extracurricular activities knew no bounds, as he joined every club available.
meanings.sent5: The extracurricular science fair project was a huge success, showcasing students' creativity.

meanings.definition: Not falling within the scope of a regular curriculum
meanings.sent1: The students were excited about the extracurricular field trip to the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The school's extracurricular music program allowed students to explore their talents.
meanings.sent3: The idea of an extracurricular pajama day at school brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her extracurricular passion for gardening bloomed into a beautiful school garden.
meanings.sent5: The extracurricular coding club helped students develop new skills outside of class.
